DOC.brief_summary: A 7-year-old arhinia patient receive nasal reconstruction nasal cavity reconstruction aid application 3D-printed nasal stent prevent nasal cavity constriction .
DOC.brief_title: Nasal Reconstruction Using Customized 3D-printed Nasal Stent Congenital Arhinia
DOC.detailed_description: After reconstruction nasal cavity maxilla bur use navigation system , patient require nasal stent prevent stenosis . However conventional stent available . A 3D-printed silicone nasal stent custom make cavity insert .
DOC.criteria: Single patient 7yearold male Congenital arhinia No history previous treatment
